cause.description:
My grandfather is currently spending the rest of his once active life in a hospital bed in his room at home, due to the effects of MS. To this day there are no cures for this debilitating diease, and it is truly a horible illness for anyone to endure. Lets keep up in helping with the fight for a cure and raise the awareness that this disease is out there, and support those that we love who have to deal with ms.
1. We must find a Cure for Ms
